summary: YESTERDAY WHILE DRIVING ON A HOUSTON HIGHWAY AT 60+ MPH MY PASSENGER SIDE DOOR UNLATCHED AND WARNING LIGHT AND SOUND CAME ON THAT MY DOOR WAS AJAR.  THE DOOR OPENED ON IT'S ON I HAD TO PULL OVER AND CLOSE IT.  THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THIS HAS HAPPENED THIS MONTH.  BOTH TIMES WHILE CAR IS IN MOTION.  I FOUND THAT THERE WAS A RECALL FROM FORD A FEW YEARS AGO FOR THIS ISSUE BUT I  SEARCHED FOR RECALLS ON MY VIN AND MINE WAS NOT RECALLED.
